name: Anime Convention
description: Join the ultimate anime gathering with panels, cosplay, merchandise, and celebrity guests.

name: Cosplay Event
description: Showcase your cosplay skills and meet fellow cosplayers in a fun and creative atmosphere.

name: Anime Screening
description: Enjoy exclusive screenings of your favorite anime series and movies on the big screen.

name: Voice Actor Appearance
description: Meet and interact with renowned voice actors and industry professionals.

name: Anime Merchandise Store
description: Shop for a wide range of anime collectibles, posters, apparel, and more.

name: Anime Travel Tour
description: Embark on a guided tour to explore anime-related locations in Japan and beyond.
